build.buildCommand: echo 'Build started at $(date)' && pip install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip setuptools wheel && pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt && pip install --no-cache-dir gunicorn==21.2.0 uvicorn[standard]==0.24.0 && cd vridge_back && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput || true

deploy.startCommand: cd vridge_back && python manage.py migrate --noinput && python -m gunicorn config.asgi:application --workers 1 --worker-class uvicorn.workers.UvicornWorker --bind 0.0.0.0:${PORT:-8000} --chdir /app/vridge_back --pythonpath /app/vridge_back --log-level debug
